price: ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߖߐ ߟߋ߬ ߊ߬ ߡߏߦߌ߫ ߟߏ߲ ߣߴߊ߬ ߛߊ߬ ߟߏ߲ ، ߊ߬ ߣߴߊ߬ ߢߣߊߡߊ ߟߊߥߟߌ߬ ߟߏ߲
arabic: وَسَلَٰمٌ عَلَيۡهِ يَوۡمَ وُلِدَ وَيَوۡمَ يَمُوتُ وَيَوۡمَ يُبۡعَثُ حَيّٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wasalāmun ʿalayhi yawma wulida wayawma yamūtu wayawma yub'ʿathu ḥayyan
